title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 167.1 - Scope of part
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 167.1 - Scope of part

State Regulations

The purpose of this Part is to establish eligibility
standards for the approval of previously unregulated agencies proposing to
provide services under the State Education Coordination and Grants Program
(SECGP), pursuant to section 123, and under section 141(o) of the Federal Job

Training Partnership Act ( P.L. 97-300)(JTPA). Such approval will be limited to
eligibility for JTPA funding. This Part will also establish the requirements
for the selection process for all agencies or institutions seeking to
participate in SECGP. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
167.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
